import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Update site view sort"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/views/for-sites/{viewId}/sort"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Updates the sort configuration for a site view without changing filters or columns. Use this to control the default order when the view loads.

**Prerequisites**
1. **viewId** - Use [GET /api/v1.0/views/for-sites](/docs/api/views/list-site-views) to list site views and extract `Items[].ViewId`.

**Workflow Example**
1. Identify the view: [GET /api/v1.0/views/for-sites](/docs/api/views/list-site-views) -&gt; choose a viewId.
2. Update the sort: [POST /api/v1.0/views/for-sites/\{viewId\}/sort](/docs/api/views/update-site-view-sort) with `Field`, `Name`, and `Direction`.
3. Reload the view to confirm the new ordering.

**Minimal Required Fields**: `viewId` (path), `Field`, `Name`, `Direction`.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"viewId","in":"path","required":true,"description":"Identifier of the site view to update.","schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"example":"0c8f7039-1234-4e7f-9c22-11c25e7b45b2"}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Sort configuration applied to a saved view.","properties":{"Field":{"type":"string","description":"Internal field name used by the API when ordering results.","example":"TicketClosedDate"},"Name":{"type":"string","description":"Human-readable label shown to users for the sorted column.","example":"Closed Date"},"Direction":{"type":"string","description":"Direction applied to the sort.","enum":["Ascending","Descending"],"example":"Ascending"}},"required":["Field","Name","Direction"],"title":"ViewSort"},"example":{"Field":"Name","Name":"View Name","Direction":"Ascending"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
